arts.ttl: Mateta starts ahead of Nketiah for Crystal Palace vs Dynamo Kyiv LIVE!
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner says he has a full squad to choose from ahead of Crystal Palace's Conference League opener against Dynamo Kyiv - but hinted Eddie Nketiah may not start, despite his match-winning heroics against Liverpool. "That’s the best for a manager; we have many players who deserve to start.

arts.ttl: Dynamo Kyiv vs Crystal Palace: UEFA Conference League Preview, League Phase, Gameweek 1, 2025
arts.sum: He was ruled out from November 2023 to August 2024 with an achilles injury and in January 2025 he picked up a meniscus problem, Doucoure is is not expected to return to the side this calendar year and was omitted from the squad for the league phase of the UEFA Conference League. Crystal Palace will travel to Lublin, Poland to take on Dynamic Kyiv in the first match of league phase of the UEFA Conference League 2025/26.

arts.ttl: Why are Crystal Palace playing Dynamo Kyiv in Poland?
arts.sum: BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team explains why Crystal Palace's Conference League debut is taking in place in Poland

arts.ttl: Dynamo Kyiv vs Crystal Palace – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Crystal Palace will make their historic debut in a major European group stage competition on Thursday when they travel to Poland to face Ukrainian champions Dynamo Kyiv. Oliver Glasner’s side are in sensational form, currently on an 18-match unbeaten run across all competitions. arts.ttl: Crystal Palace XI vs Dynamo Kyiv – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: A historic night awaits Crystal Palace on Thursday as they play their first-ever match in a major European group stage competition, facing Dynamo Kyiv in the UEFA Conference League. The occasion marks a huge milestone for the club, who qualified for Europe by winning their first-ever FA Cup last season. arts.ttl: Dynamo Kyiv vs Crystal Palace predictions: Eagles can grind out opening win
arts.sum: Dynamo Kyiv face Crystal Palace on Thursday and James Milton expects the Conference League favourite Eagles to make a winning start in Poland.
